```{r, include = FALSE}

library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
data <- read_csv("example courses.csv")
```
#General courses
```{r, results = 'asis', echo = FALSE}
#cat(paste0("Course ",data[1,1]))
if(data$category == "General"){
data_gen <- data %>% filter(category == "General")
for (i in 1:nrow(data)){
  cat(paste0(" \n","Course ",data[i,1]," \n"))
}
}

```
